required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Study Comparing HLX01 And Rituximab in Patients With CD20-Positive, B-cell Lymphoma

brief_summary.textblock: Randomised, double-blind, parallel group study to compare PK and PD profiles between HLX01 and rituximab (MabThera®) in patients with CD20+ B-cell Lymphoma.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve (AUC) for HLX01 and rituximab concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: The Maximum Concentration (Cmax) of the HLX01 and rituximab
Presence of Anti-Drug Antibodies against HLX01
Change from baseline of CD19+ B-cells
